original_title: 呪われた都市伝説　紫鏡
overview: A horror that depicts the urban legend "Purple Mirror" on an overwhelming scale. Kitagawa Tomoko, who celebrated her 20th birthday, is walking through the city when she suddenly wanders into a dimly lit forest. While walking around in a panic, a bloodied man jumped out of the ruins in the back of the forest and died in front of him.
title: Cursed Urban Legend : Purple Mirror
